name: The Question (miserable little smug bastard)
description:
Carrie has been crushing on Hamza for what feels like forever. When she finally gets the chance to talk to him one-on-one, will things go the way she's always dreamed?

A short, mostly kinetic visual novel about romance and unexpected confessions. Made in one day for the Nonbinary Game Jam. 

Contains discussion of dysphoria.

-

Graphics:

Sprites made with Fungii's Male and Female Customizable Sprites
Backgrounds by Konett

Music:

"Impulsive Feelings" by DJ Rolfsky
"Welcome" by DJ Rolfsky
"Relax" by DJ Rolfsky
